name: Replica Duodrone
languages: can understand Common but speaks only preprogrammed responses

traits.name: Axiomatic Mind
entries: The duodrone can't be compelled to act in a manner contrary to its nature or its instructions.

traits.name: Disintegration
entries: If the duodrone dies, its body disintegrates into dust, leaving behind its weapons and anything else it was carrying.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The duodrone makes two fist attacks or two javelin attacks.

actions.name: Fist
entries: Melee atk +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 2 (1d4 damage) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Javelin
entries: Melee/Ranged atk +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. 4 (1d6 + 1 damage) piercing damage.
